DOC.brief_summary: To determine the ability of magnetic resonance lymphangiography using conventional gadolinium injected directly into the tumor site and PET scan in detecting microscopic nodal metastasis in patients with newly diagnosed H&N cancers
DOC.brief_title: Indirect Magnetic Resonance Lymphangiography of the Head and Neck Region Using Conventional Gadolinium-based Contrast
DOC.criteria: Patients with newly diagnosed squamous cell carcinomas of the H&N with primary tumor sites that are accessible to direct contrast injections
